title: OCR Text Scanner
description: A lightweight web application that extracts text from uploaded images using Optical Character Recognition (OCR).
Built with a React.js frontend and a FastAPI backend, it uses EasyOCR and OpenCV for text detection and visualization.
Users can upload an image, instantly extract the text, view it, and copy it to their clipboard with a single click.

title: Period Tracker
description: A mobile application that helps users track menstrual cycles, predict ovulation and fertile windows, and monitor symptoms.
Designed with user-friendly interface to empower women with better reproductive health awareness.

title: crowd sense
description: Developed a custom object detection model for real-time threat identification using YOLOv8 and Roboflow.
Handled dataset curation, annotation, model training, evaluation, and deployment with a focus on practical application and optimization.
